title: Ticket #5677: submit filename should be available to submit files.
description:
it would be useful to have the full path to the submit file be available for $() substitution within the submit file. This would allow it to be easily added to the job, and also used to set things like the batch name automatically.

Something like 

   # include the full path to the submit file in the job ad
   +SubmitFile = $Fq(SUBMIT_FILE)


   # use the submit file basename as the batch name
   batch_name = $Fn(SUBMIT_FILE)


   # use the submit file directory and cluster as the batch name
   submit_dir = $Fd(SUBMIT_FILE)
   batch_name = $SUBSTR(submit_dir,0,-1) $(ClusterId)
